title: We welcome you and your fur babies!
posting_body: Mosaic on Greenwood Mosaic on Greenwood is a perfect combination of comfort and style nestled in the Broadview neighborhood of Seattle, Washington.
This gated community has a selection of featured amenities with garage parking and a gorgeous courtyard and pond to enjoy.
Spend less time commuting and more time enjoying family, friends, dining out, outdoor adventures, and local entertainment nearby.
Discover gorgeous natural scenery including the well-known gem, Carkeek Park.
Schedule a tour today to discover your new home at Mosaic on Greenwood.
Unique One and Two Bedroom Floor Plans
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
